snippet: Bill de Blasio, who was elected to become the first Democratic mayor of New York City in 20 years, will have a far grander stage on which to test the liberal worldview that has been the hallmark of his career.
abstract: Man in the News; Bill de Blasio, who is elected to become the first Democratic mayor of New York City in 20 years, will have a far grander stage on which to test the liberal worldview that has been the hallmark of his career; he is an audacious liberal accustomed to exceeding expectations.

byline.contributor: Michael M. Grynbaum and Kate Taylor contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Bill de Blasio, who was elected to become the first Democratic mayor of New York City in 20 years, will have a far grander stage on which to test the liberal worldview that has been the hallmark of his career.

headline.seo: Heading to City Hall, Bill de Blasio Is Used to Exceeding Expectations
headline.main: New York’s Next Mayor, an Audacious Liberal
headline.kicker: Man in the News | Bill de Blasio
headline.sub:
Bill de Blasio Is
Used to Exceeding
Expectations
